questions.text: "What are you talking about, you're the crappiest bowling ball I have ever seen in my life"?
questions.explanation:
Johnny Knoxville.

	Knoxville was saying this to Preston after he refused to go on with the "Human bowling ball" skit.

questions.text: "But what else is not permitted, is what he has attempted to do with my mid-wife, commit the act of sussex"?
questions.explanation:
Brandon DiCamillo.

	This was by Bran to Bam, in "BMX Joust".

questions.text: "My job on the show is to be naked, not kill myself"?
questions.explanation:
Chris Pontius.

	Pontius was scared about running a tandem bike down a huge hill when he said this.

questions.text: "I'm ______(-) _______ and I'm about to hit some haggard backwoods crap"?
questions.explanation:
Ryan Dunn.

	What Ryan meant was that he was going to run his bike into a tree.

questions.text: "Dude, I'm in the same boat as Tony Hawk, now this is just too much"?
questions.explanation:
Bam Margera.

	Bam was on a boat with Tony Hawk, and just after he said this quote, he jumped off the side of the boat.

questions.text: "Hi, I'm _______(-)_______ and I'm about to get run over by air boat"?
questions.explanation:
Steve-O.

	Steve-O was supposed to duck down before the boat hit him, but he went down to late and got hit in the head with the front of the boat.

questions.text: "First I got electrocuted, then I got skunk all over me, I've enough for one day leave me alone"?
questions.explanation:
Rick Kosick.

	Rick Kosick was first tricked into putting on a electrical dog collar, then he had the be the cameraman for Johnny Knoxville playing with a skunk.

Johnny Knoxville.

	Johnny Knoxville said this just after getting his suit on to become a matador.

Raab Himself.

	Raab Himself said this in the funniest way possible.

Chris Pontius.

	He said this as the crew was entering Helsinki, Finland during the Gumball Rally.
